abstract: The stock market rose as investors speculated that a drop in new home sales would give the Federal Reserve more reason to lower interest rates.
snippet: The stock market rose as investors speculated that a drop in new home sales would give the Federal Reserve more reason to lower interest rates.
lead_paragraph: The stock market rose yesterday as investors speculated that a drop in new home sales would give the Federal Reserve more reason to lower interest rates.

headline.main: Hope for Another Rate Cut Lifts Shares
headline.print_headline: Hope for Another Rate Cut Lifts Shares
